data.meta_description: Alex Fong Chungsun (Chinese  born March 17, 1963) is a Hong Kong actor. He married actress Hoyan Mok in 2008, They have one daughter. Siddhesh Joshi

(Editor)

I enjoy creating and spreading knowledgeable content for everyone around the world and try my best not to leave even the smallest of mistakes go unnoticed.

Alex Fong (actor)

Share on FacebookTweet on TwitterShare on LinkedInShare on Reddit

Sign in

Alex fong with his wife and daughter 25 01 2010

Alex Fong Chung-sun (Chinese: 方中信; born March 17, 1963) is a Hong Kong actor. He married actress Hoyan Mok in 2008, They have one daughter.

Contents

Alex fong with his wife and daughter 25 01 2010

Graham interview with alex fong

Incidents

Television

Music video appearances

Filmography

References

Graham interview with alex fong

Incidents

Fong has been a brand representative of DOXA, a brand of watches since 2008. In the opening ceremony of DOXA's flagship store in Guangzhou, Fong was sexually harassed by another female guest of the event. DOXA issued an open declaration stating Fong's under-performing had harmed the image of the brand, and therefore terminate the co-operation. Mani Fok, the representative of the artist management that Fong belonged to, explicitly said that the issues involve some requirement which was outside the signed contract as a brand representative.
